author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for samples of Police Chief Recruitment processes that are not A-typical.  They are looking for innovative, unique processes.    
They are also looking for examples of ways for the Council to have input or interaction in presenting/weighing in on what they would like to have in a new Police Chief.  The Council will not be involved in the recruitment or interview process.  
You’re ideas, suggestions and samples are appreciated!
Pam
